attributes.action: Ban dangerous and high risk home made dummy clips and bling dummies
attributes.additional_details:
Facebook and Ebay have become a breeding ground for many people to earn money without being ethically responsible for the products they sell.

These products contain risks due to chemicals, sharp parts and small parts that can pose risk of injury, illness or death.

We would like the government to tighten regulations in health and safety to ensure that these sellers are held accountable for producing safe to use products for the purpose they are intended and for notifying buyers of the risks.

We would like the government to ensure that those sellers who fail in the above requirement face penalties if caught selling products that do not meet a minimum standard of health and safety and that upon any injury or death caused by their product face the possibility of imprisonment.
